line.words: Alrededor del mundo

subtitle.line: Around the World
Around the World

line.words: Una mañana Emil se despierta como siempre. A Emil le gusta su rutina. Siempre le da de comer al gato por la mañana. ¡Pero algo raro pasa esta mañana!

subtitle.line: One morning Emil wakes up as usual. Emil likes his routines. He always feeds his cat in the morning. But this morning something is wrong!
One morning Emil wakes up as usual. Emil likes his routines. He always feeds his cat in the morning. But this morning something is wrong!

line.words: Su gato no está allí. Emil mira por todas partes pero no puede encontrar a su gato. Entonces ve una nota en la mesa de la cocina.

subtitle.line: His cat is not there! Emil looks everywhere but cannot find his cat. Then he sees a note on the kitchen table.
His cat is not there! Emil looks everywhere but cannot find his cat. Then he sees a note on the kitchen table.

line.words: La nota dice: “si quieres que tu gato vuelva, tienes que viajar alrededor del mundo y recoger tres pistas. Debes empezar en España. Busca a alguien que este iendo al colegio en el país que visitas.”

subtitle.line: The note says: ‘If you want your cat back you have to travel around the world and collect 3 clues. You must start in Spain. Look for someone on their way to school in each country you visit.’
The note says: ‘If you want your cat back you have to travel around the world and collect 3 clues. You must start in Spain. Look for someone on their way to school in each country you visit.’

line.words: Emil quiere a su gato, y empieza a hacer la maleta inmediatamente. “¿Qué haces, cariño?” Le pregunta su madre. “Voy a hacer un viaje alrededor del mundo para salvar a mi gato,” dice Emil.

subtitle.line: Emil loves his cat, and starts packing straight away. §What are you doing darling?§ Asks his mum. §I’m going to a trip around the world to save my cat,§ Emil says.
Emil loves his cat, and starts packing straight away. §What are you doing darling?§ Asks his mum. §I’m going to a trip around the world to save my cat,§ Emil says.

line.words: “¡Muy bien, cariño. No te olvides el cepillo de dientes,” dice su madre.

subtitle.line: §OK darling. Don’t forget to brush your teeth!§ says his mum.
§OK darling. Don’t forget to brush your teeth!§ says his mum.

line.words: Emil encuentra su pasaporte y lo pone en su mochila.

subtitle.line: Emil finds his passport and he puts it in his bag.
Emil finds his passport and he puts it in his bag.

line.words: Emil encuentra su dinero y lo pone en su mochila

subtitle.line: Emil finds his money and He puts it in his bag.
Emil finds his money and He puts it in his bag.

line.words: Emil encuentra su pelota de fútbol y la pone en su mochila.

subtitle.line: Emil finds his football and He puts it in his bag.
Emil finds his football and He puts it in his bag.

line.words: Emil encuentra el teléfono de su padre y lo pone en su mochila.

subtitle.line: Emil finds his dad’s telephone and He puts it in his bag.
Emil finds his dad’s telephone and He puts it in his bag.

line.words: Va al ordenador y reserva un billete. Va a España, después a Méjico y después a Cuba.

subtitle.line: He goes to the computer and reserves a ticket. He is going to Spain, then Mexico and then Cuba.
He goes to the computer and reserves a ticket. He is going to Spain, then Mexico and then Cuba.

line.words: Deja la casa. “¡Adiós, mamá!” le dice. “¡Adiós, cariño! Ten un buen día en el colegio,” le dice su madre.

subtitle.line: He leaves his house. §Bye mum!§ he calls. §Bye darling! Have a nice day at school.§ His mum says.
He leaves his house. §Bye mum!§ he calls. §Bye darling! Have a nice day at school.§ His mum says.

line.words: Se va al aeropuerto y recoge sus billetes. Se sube al avión, está nervioso, pero muy entusiasmado.

subtitle.line: He goes to the airport and collects his ticket. He gets on the plane. He is nervous, but very excited.
He goes to the airport and collects his ticket. He gets on the plane. He is nervous, but very excited.

line.words: El avión aterriza en el aeropuerto de Barcelona. El aeropuerto se llama “aeropuerto del Prat.” Y entonces coge el tren a la ciudad.

subtitle.line: The plane lands at the airport in Barcelona. The airport is called ‘Prat’. Then Emil goes by train into the city.
The plane lands at the airport in Barcelona. The airport is called ‘Prat’. Then Emil goes by train into the city.

line.words: Emil mira alrededor. Está fascinado con los edificios. “¡Mira que formas!” dice. “Un famoso arquitecto llamado Gaudí las diseñó,” dice un transeúnte.

subtitle.line: Emil looks around. He is amazed at the buildings. §Look at the shapes!§ he says. §A famous architect called Gaudi designed them,§ says a passerby.
Emil looks around. He is amazed at the buildings. §Look at the shapes!§ he says. §A famous architect called Gaudi designed them,§ says a passerby.

line.words: Entonces ve a un niño que va al colegio. “¡Hola! ¿Vas al colegio?”

subtitle.line: Then he sees a boy on his way to school. §Hello! Are you going to school?§
Then he sees a boy on his way to school. §Hello! Are you going to school?§

line.words: “Sí,” dice el niño. “Voy en bici. Tengo algo para tí.” El niño le da una foto arrugada a Emil y se va.

subtitle.line: §Yes§ says the boy. §I go by bike. I have something for you.§ The boy gives Emil a torn photograph and rides off.
§Yes§ says the boy. §I go by bike. I have something for you.§ The boy gives Emil a torn photograph and rides off.

line.words: Emil pone la foto arrugada cuidadosamente en su mochila, va a la estación de tren y coge el tren al aeropuerto. “¡Siguiente parada: Méjico!”

subtitle.line: Emil puts the torn photograph carefully into his bag, goes to the train station and goes by train to the airport. §Next stop Mexico!§
Emil puts the torn photograph carefully into his bag, goes to the train station and goes by train to the airport. §Next stop Mexico!§

line.words: Después de un largo vuelo, Emil llega al aeropuerto de Méjico, la ciudad de Méjico. La ciudad es grande, está llena de gente y hace calor.

subtitle.line: After a long flight Emil arrives at the airport in the capital of Mexico, Mexico City. The city is big, crowded and hot.
After a long flight Emil arrives at the airport in the capital of Mexico, Mexico City. The city is big, crowded and hot.

line.words: Emil coge el autobús a la ciudad. Ve un extraordinario edificio. El edificio parece muy antiguo. “¿Qué es eso?” le pregunta a una anciana.

subtitle.line: Emil takes a bus into the city. He sees an extraordinary building. The building looks very old. §What is that?§ He asks an old lady.
Emil takes a bus into the city. He sees an extraordinary building. The building looks very old. §What is that?§ He asks an old lady.

line.words: “Es la pirámide de Tenayuca, fue construida por los aztecas hace ochocientos años,” dice. “Esta es una tierra muy antigua.”

subtitle.line: §That is the ancient pyramid Tenayuca built by the Aztecs 800 years ago!§ she says. §This is an ancient land!§
§That is the ancient pyramid Tenayuca built by the Aztecs 800 years ago!§ she says. §This is an ancient land!§

line.words: Entonces, Emil ve a una niña caminando. Lleva un uniforme escolar.

subtitle.line: Then Emil sees a girl walking past. She has a school uniform on.
Then Emil sees a girl walking past. She has a school uniform on.

line.words: “¡Hola! ¿Vas al colegio?” “Si,” dice la niña. “Voy a pie al colegio. Tengo algo para tí.” La niña le da otra foto arrugada y se va.

subtitle.line: §Hello! Are you going to school?§ Yes says the girl.§ §I walk to school. I have something for you.§ The girl gives Emil another torn photograph and walks off.
§Hello! Are you going to school?§ Yes says the girl.§ §I walk to school. I have something for you.§ The girl gives Emil another torn photograph and walks off.

line.words: Emil pone la foto arrrugada cuidadosamente en su mochila, va a la parade del autobús y se va al aeropuerto en autobús. “¡Siguiente parada: Cuba!”

subtitle.line: Emil puts the torn photograph carefully into his bag, goes to the bus stop and goes by bus to the airport. §Next stop Cuba!§
Emil puts the torn photograph carefully into his bag, goes to the bus stop and goes by bus to the airport. §Next stop Cuba!§

line.words: Después de un corto vuelo, Emil llega al aeropuerto de Cuba. Coge un taxi con forma de huevo a la capital, la Havana.

subtitle.line: After a short flight Emil arrives at the airport in Cuba. He takes an egg-shaped taxi to the capital, Havana.
After a short flight Emil arrives at the airport in Cuba. He takes an egg-shaped taxi to the capital, Havana.

line.words: Como en Méjico, en la Havana hace calor y está abarrotada. Emil ve a maravillosos coches, y ponis y coches de caballos.

subtitle.line: Like Mexico City, Havana is hot and busy. Emil sees amazing cars, and ponies and horses pulling carts.
Like Mexico City, Havana is hot and busy. Emil sees amazing cars, and ponies and horses pulling carts.

line.words: En un pequeño parque Emil ve a varios hombres tocando algunos instrumentos y escucha la música.

subtitle.line: In a little park Emil sees some men playing instruments. He listens to the music.
In a little park Emil sees some men playing instruments. He listens to the music.

line.words: La música es fantástica: “¿Quiénes sois?” pregunta. “Somos la Compañía Segundo, y esta música se llama El Son.”

subtitle.line: The music is fantastic! §Who are you?§ he asks. §We are Compay Segundo, and this music is called El Son!§
The music is fantastic! §Who are you?§ he asks. §We are Compay Segundo, and this music is called El Son!§

line.words: Entonces Emil ve a una niña pasar con un burro. Lleva un uniforme escolar y trenzas en el pelo.

subtitle.line: Then Emil sees a girl passing on a donkey. She has a school uniform on and plaits in her hair.
Then Emil sees a girl passing on a donkey. She has a school uniform on and plaits in her hair.

line.words: “¡Hola! ¿Vas al colegio?“ §Sí,§ dice la niña. “Voy en el burro de mi hermano. Tengo algo para tí.” La niña le da una foto arrugada y se va.

subtitle.line: §Hello! Are you going to school?§ Yes says the girl. §I ride to school on my brother’s donkey. I have something for you.§ The girl gives Emil another torn photograph and rides away.
§Hello! Are you going to school?§ Yes says the girl. §I ride to school on my brother’s donkey. I have something for you.§ The girl gives Emil another torn photograph and rides away.

line.words: “¡Hora de volver a casa!” dice Emil. Se va al aeropuerto en coche, un fantástico coche, y va a la casa en avión.

subtitle.line: §Time to go home!§ Says Emil. He goes to the airport by car – a fantastic car – and goes home by plane.
§Time to go home!§ Says Emil. He goes to the airport by car – a fantastic car – and goes home by plane.

line.words: En el avión Emil saca las tres fotos. ¡Se unen como un puzle! Mira cuidadosamente la foto.

subtitle.line: On the aeroplane Emil takes out the 3 pieces of photograph. They match up like a puzzle! He looks carefully at the picture.
On the aeroplane Emil takes out the 3 pieces of photograph. They match up like a puzzle! He looks carefully at the picture.

line.words: ¡La foto es de una niña, su vecina Juanita!

subtitle.line: The picture is of a girl – it’s his neighbour Juanita!
The picture is of a girl – it’s his neighbour Juanita!

line.words: Va directamente del aeropuerto a la casa de Juanita. Juanita ha vuelto del colegio.

subtitle.line: He goes straight to Juanita’s house from the airport. She is back from school. ‘Hi Emil! Your cat is here!’
He goes straight to Juanita’s house from the airport. She is back from school. ‘Hi Emil! Your cat is here!’

line.words: Emil está muy feliz. Va a casa con su gato. “¡Hola cariño! Dice su madre. “¿Cómo fue el colegio?”

subtitle.line: Emil is very happy. He goes home with his cat. §Hello darling,§ says his mum. §How was school?§
Emil is very happy. He goes home with his cat. §Hello darling,§ says his mum. §How was school?§
The End
The End
